description: Detects calls to PowerShell with Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet using direct IP access
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Invoke-WebRequest Execution With DirectIP
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND process.command_line.text:("*curl\ *" OR "*Invoke\-WebRequest*" OR "*iwr\ *" OR "*wget\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*\:\/\/1*" OR "*\:\/\/2*" OR "*\:\/\/3*" OR "*\:\/\/4*" OR "*\:\/\/5*" OR "*\:\/\/6*" OR "*\:\/\/7*" OR "*\:\/\/8*" OR "*\:\/\/9*"))
